@nocobase/plugin-ai.Frequency penalty description: 介于 -2.0 和 2.0 之间的数字。如果该值为正，那么新 token 会根据其在已有文本中的出现频率受到相应的惩罚，降低模型重复相同内容的可能性。

@nocobase/plugin-ai.Temperature description: 采样温度，介于 0 和 2 之间。更高的值，如 0.8，会使输出更随机，而更低的值，如 0.2，会使其更加集中和确定。

@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Password complexity numbers_upper_lower_: 必须包含数字，大写和小写字母，符号

@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Security settings notice lockout: 用户在 {{ maxSignInAttemptsInterval }} 秒内连续 {{ maxSignInAttempts }} 次无效密码登录尝试后将被锁定 {{ lockoutDuration }} 秒。

@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Security settings notice no lockout: 用户每 {{ maxSignInAttemptsInterval }} 秒可以尝试密码登录 {{ maxSignInAttempts }} 次。
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.The account has been locked due to too m: 由于登录尝试次数过多，该账户已被锁定。
@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.The account has been reached the maximum: 该账户已达到最大登录尝试次数，请稍后再试。

@nocobase/plugin-password-policy.Your password will expire in {{days}} da: 你的密码将在 {{days}} 天后过期，请重置密码。

@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Triggered according to preset time condi: 按预设的时间条件定时触发。适用于一次性或周期性的任务，如定时发送通知、清理数据等。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Triggered but still waiting in queue to: 已触发但仍在队列中等待执行。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Triggered only if one of the selected fi: 只有被选中的某个字段发生变动时才会触发。如果不选择，则表示任何字段变动时都会触发。新增或删除数据时，任意字段都被认为发生变动。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Triggered when data changes in the colle: 当数据表中的数据发生变化时触发，比如新增、更新或删除一条数据后。与“操作后事件”不同，数据表事件监听数据变动而不是 HTTP 请求，除非你明白确切含义，否则推荐使用“操作后事件”。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Unassigned fields will be set to default: 未被赋值的字段将被设置为默认值，没有默认值的设置为空值。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Update all eligible data at one time, wh: 一次性更新所有符合条件的数据，在数据量较大时有比较好的性能；但不支持关系字段的更新（除非是在当前表中的外键），被更新的数据也不会触发其他工作流。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Update records of a collection. You can: 更新一个数据表中的数据。可以使用上游节点里的变量作为查询条件和数据值。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Will be executed in the background as a: 将作为队列任务在后台执行。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Workflow executed, the result status is: 工作流已执行，结果状态为 <1>{{statusText}}</1><2>查看执行详情</2>
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Workflow will be triggered before deleti: 删除成功之前触发工作流（支持操作前事件）。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Workflow will be triggered directly once: 按钮点击后直接触发工作流，但不会保存数据。仅支持绑定“自定义操作事件”。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow.Workflow with unknown type will cause er: 未知类型的工作流会导致错误，请删除或检查提供该类型的插件。

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-action-trigger.Event triggers when submitted a workflow: Event triggers when submitted a workflow bound form action.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-action-trigger.Global mode, triggered after the complet: 全局模式，以下操作执行完成后都触发
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-action-trigger.Local mode, triggered after the completi: 局部模式，绑定该工作流的操作执行完成后触发
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-action-trigger.The collection to which the triggered da: 触发数据所属的数据表。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-action-trigger.Triggered after the completion of a requ: 通过操作按钮或 API 发起请求时，在请求执行成功后触发该事件，比如新增、更新操作之后。适用于在操作完成后进行数据处理、发送通知等。
Use a collection to match form data.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-aggregate.Counting, summing, finding maximum, mini: 对一个数据表里的多条数据或者一条数据里的关系数据进行统计、求和、求最大值、最小值、平均值。

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Actions from any form block can be bound: 可以将任意表单区块的操作绑定到该工作流，用于发起审批，并在单条数据的审批区块里处理和跟踪审批过程，通常适用于业务数据。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Allow the initiator to withdraw the appr: 在审批开始之前，允许发起人撤回审批。
Anyone approve or reject as result.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Approval data key: 审批数据记录唯一标识符
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Approve when approvals rate greater than: Approve when approvals rate greater than the set percentage, reject when rejections rate greater than or equal to (1 - percentage).
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Approved if the approval rate is greater: 通过率大于设置的百分比时通过，否则否决。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.At least one default template in specifi: 特定渠道和类型下至少需要保留一个默认模板。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Could run different branch based on resu: 根据结果运行不同的分支。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Event will be triggered when submitted c: Event will be triggered when submitted current workflow bound form action, or new application from approval block.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Everyone approve as approved, or any one: Everyone approve as approved, or any one reject as rejected.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.For initiating approvals, or viewing and: 用于发起审批，或者查看和操作已发起的审批。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.If checked, the workflow will be termina: If checked, the workflow will be terminated after rejection branch processed.
所有人通过才通过，任意一人否决则否决。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.If it's approved by anyone, it's approve: 任意一人通过即通过，所有人否决才否决。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.In addition to data blocks, a global app: 除了数据区块，还可以在全局的审批中心发起和处理审批，这通常适用于行政数据。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Initiate in both data blocks and global: 在数据区块和审批中心都可以发起
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Manual approval operations within the ap: 在审批流程内进行人工审批操作，审批人可以在全局的审批区块里进行审批，也可以在单条数据的审批区块里审批。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Multiple approvers can approve in any or: 多个审批人可以任意顺序审批。
多个审批人按照排序审批。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Notify applicant when approval is approv: 审批通过、拒绝或退回时通知申请人。
任务开始时通知审批人。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Send notifications to applicant when app: 审批完成时发送通知给申请人。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Send notifications to assignees when app: 审批待办分配时发送通知给审批人。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Submission not exists or has been withdr: 提交不存在或已被撤回，请尝试刷新列表。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.The approval or rejection by anyone of t: 任意一人通过或否决即为结果。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.This operation can not be revocated. Ple: 该操作不可撤回，请确认后再提交。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Title of each task item in approval tabl: 在审批表格中的每项任务的名称。可以使用字符串模板中的变量。默认为节点名称。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Title of each task item. Default to node: Title of each task item. Default to node title.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Triggered when an approval request is in: 通过操作按钮或 API 发起审批申请时触发。专用于审批流程，有专属的审批节点和区块用于管理单据和追踪处理过程。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Used to perform manual approval operatio: Used to perform manual approval operations within approval workflow, approvers can perform approval action through the to-do list in the approval block, such as approval, rejection or return.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Values in the modifiable fields above ma: 如果由其他审批人提交过修改，以上可修改字段中的值可能与原始申请不同。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.When checked, the workflow will terminat: 勾选后，否决分支结束后工作流将终止。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.When rejected or returned, the workflow: 当否决或退回时，工作流将立即终止。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.When select assignees from node result,: 从节点结果中选择审批人时，仅支持用户 ID（或用户 ID 数组）。其他结果将不匹配任何用户。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-approval.Withdrawable changes unsaved, click \"Su: 撤回操作变更尚未保存，点击“提交”保存。

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-custom-action-.Could be used on non-record related acti: 可用于非数据行相关的操作按钮。例如工作台面板或表格区块中的按钮。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-custom-action-.Could only be used on multiple record re: 仅支持用于多行数据相关的操作按钮。例如在表格区块中的批量操作。触发器变量中的数据将是数组。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-custom-action-.Could only be used on single record rela: 仅支持用于单行数据相关的操作按钮。例如在表单、详情区块和数据行中。

仅支持上下文类型设置为“无上下文”的自定义操作工作流。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-custom-action-.When the \"Trigger Workflow\" button is: 点击“触发工作流”按钮时，基于按钮所在位置的不同上下文触发该事件。适用于对数据的处理过程较复杂，不能被 NocoBase 内置的操作（增删改查）简单处理时，可通过工作流来定义一系列操作，并通过“触发工作流”按钮触发。

When the "Trigger Workflow" button is clicked, the event is triggered based on the single record where the button is located. Suitable for when the data processing is complex and cannot be simply processed by built-in operations (CRUD) of NocoBase, a series of operations can be defined through workflow and triggered through the "Trigger Workflow" button.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-custom-action-.Workflow will be triggered directly once: 点击按钮后将直接触发工作流，不会保存数据。仅支持绑定“自定义操作事件”。

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-date-calculati.Only calculation functions with numeric: 仅支持通过以数值类型为输入值的函数进行计算。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-date-calculati.Set to time of unit end: 将日期设置为特定单位的结束时间
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-date-calculati.Set to time of unit start: 将日期设置为特定单位的开始时间
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-date-calculati.Used for doing a series of date related: 用于对输入值进行一系列日期相关的计算。

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-delay.Delay a period of time and then continue: 延时一段时间，然后继续或退出流程。可以用于并行分支中等待其他分支或设置超时时间。

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-dynamic-calcul.An expression for calculation in each ro: An expression for calculation in each rows
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-dynamic-calcul.Calculate an expression based on a calcu: 基于计算引擎计算表达式并获取值作为结果。可以在表达式中使用上游节点的变量。表达式是从表达式表中动态获取的。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-dynamic-calcul.Select the dynamic expression queried fr: 从上游节点中选择查询出来的动态表达式。你需要从动态表达式类型的数据表中查询。

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-javascript.Continue workflow when exception is thro: Continue workflow when exception is throw
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-javascript.Execute a piece of JavaScript in an isol: 在隔离的 Node.js 环境中执行一段 JavaScript 代码。

在此文档中查看脚本使用说明:

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-javascript.The arguments that will be used in scrip: 在脚本可直接使用参数
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-javascript.The maximum Milliseconds time of the scr: The maximum execution time of the script. 0 means no timeout.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-javascript.The maximum execution time of the script: 脚本超时时间，0表示不设置超时

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-json-query.If the type of query result is object or: 如果查询结果的类型是对象或对象数组，则可以映射后续节点中要访问的属性。

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-json-variable-.If the JSON object contains array items,: 如果样例包含数组，例如: { "arrayKey": [ "item1", "item2" ]， 则会解析成 "arrayKey", "arrayKey.0", "arrayKey.1", 如果不勾选，则只解析成 "arrayKey"。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-json-variable-.Please input JSON example like { \"key1\: 请输入 JSON 样例，例如 { "key1": "item1", "key2": "item2" }
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-json-variable-.Please update other node references to t: 请在点击 parse 按钮后更新其它节点对 key 的引用
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-json-variable-.Used for mapping any JSON data to struct: 用于将任意 JSON 数据映射为结构化的变量，以供后续节点使用。

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-loop.A single number will be treated as a loo: 单一数字值将被视为循环次数，单一字符串值将被视为字符数组，其他非数组值将被转换为数组。达到循环次数，或者将数组循环完成后，循环节点结束。你也可以在循环中添加条件节点，以终止循环。

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-loop.Exit loop and continue workflow: 退出循环并继续工作流
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-loop.When node inside loop failed: 当循环内节点执行失败时

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-mailer.Subject: 主题

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-manual.Could be used for manually submitting da: 可用于人工提交数据，并决定是否继续或退出流程。工作流在执行到人工节点时会为被指派的用户生成待办事项，直到用户提交对应表单后继续处理该流程。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-manual.Each user has own task: 每个人处理各自的任务
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-manual.Everyone shares one task: 所有人共享同一个任务

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-notification.Send notification. You can use the varia: 发送通知。您可以使用上游节点中的变量作为通知的内容和其他配置。

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-request.Only support standard JSON data: 仅支持标准 JSON 数据

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-request-interc.Global mode, triggered before executing: 全局模式，以下操作执行前都触发
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-request-interc.Local mode, triggered before executing t: 局部模式，绑定该工作流的操作执行前触发

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-request-interc.Triggered before submitting a create, up: Triggered before submitting a create, update, or delete request to a collection, so that data validation, logical judgment, etc., can be performed before executing the request, and then either approving the request or rejecting the request by using the "End process" node.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-request-interc.Triggered before the execution of a requ: 通过操作按钮或 API 发起请求并在执行前触发，比如新增、更新、删除数据之前。适用于在操作前进行数据验证、逻辑判断，并可通过“结束节点”来拦截请求。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-request-interc.Triggered only when a form bound to this: Triggered only when a form bound to this workflow is submitted

在数据库中执行一个 SQL 语句

选择一个数据源来执行 SQL

Set output data of this workflow. When this one is executed as a subflow, the output could be used as variables in downstream nodes of super workflow. If this node is added multiple times, the value of the last node prevails.

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Header value support letters, numbers, u: 键值支持字母、数字、下划线 “_” 或连字符 “-”。

@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Name: 名称
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Please input JSON example from request b: 请输入请求体的 JSON 样例，例如 { "key1": "item1", "key2": "item2" }
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Please set user name and password, and c: Please set user name and password, and callback URL should be
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Request data can only be used as variabl: 请求数据在解析配置后才可作为变量在后续节点中使用。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Synchronized workflows require the addit: 同步工作流需要添加响应节点设置。如果没有添加 Response 节点，工作流执行成功则响应状态码设置为 200，失败后响应状态码设置为 500。如果添加 Response 节点后工作流异常没有执行到 Response 节点，则响应状态码设置为 500
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.These request data can only be used as v: These request data can only be used as variables in next nodes after the configuration has been parsed.
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Third-party calls to Webhook URLs trigge: 第三方调用Webhook URL触发流程执行。适用于第三方系统发起通知、支付回调、消息等。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.This URL has been generated to accept th: 已生成一个用来接受请求的 URL, 用于触发workflow 执行
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Username and password are required: 用户名和密码是必填项
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.Username and password need to be put in: 用户名和密码应该放在 URL 中，例如 “{{url}}”。参见：<1>MDN 参考</1>。
@nocobase/plugin-workflow-webhook.When webhook URL is called, the received: Webhook URL 被调用后，对接收到的参数进行结构化转换设置，以便在后续节点中使用。
